meanings.definition: The act of making something personalized or tailored to an individual's preferences or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The personalization of the gift made it extra special for her.
meanings.sent2: Online shopping websites offer personalization options for customers.
meanings.sent3: The personalization of his lunchbox with stickers made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The personalization of the training program to each employee's needs boosted morale.
meanings.sent5: The personalization of the birthday cake with her name in icing was a delightful surprise.

meanings.definition: The process of customizing or individualizing something to suit a specific person or group.
meanings.sent1: She appreciated the personalization of the service to meet her requirements.
meanings.sent2: The personalization of the marketing campaign led to increased customer engagement.
meanings.sent3: The personalization of his outfit for the party made him stand out in a good way.
meanings.sent4: The personalization of the tour to cater to different interests was a hit with the group.
meanings.sent5: The personalization of the playlist for the event set the perfect mood for the evening.
